blogPost.excerpt: ZelaaPayAE crypto cards allow for transactions online and in brick-and-mortar establishments at market rates, backed by our cryptocurrency ZPAE. With the ZPAYae card, you can immediately exchange fiat to crypto and then pay directly for your goods or send it to a friend.
blogPost.body: ZelaaPayAE crypto cards allow for transactions online and in brick-and-mortar establishments at market rates, backed by our cryptocurrency ZPAE. With the ZPAYae card, you can immediately exchange fiat to crypto and then pay directly for your goods or send it to a friend.
blogPost.title: ZPAE Crypto Card - Pay with ZPAE Card around the world at 40,000,000+ merchants
blogPost.author: Vishal Sharma

localize.description: ZelaaPayAE加密卡可以按市场价格在网上和实体店进行交易，由我们的加密货币ZPAE支持。使用ZPAYae卡，您可以立即将货币兑换成加密货币，然后直接支付货款或发送给朋友。
localize.tagline: 在全球40,000,000+商户使用ZPAE卡支付。

localize.description: ZelaaPayAE加密卡可以按市場價格在網上和實體店進行交易，由我們的加密貨幣ZPAE支持。使用ZPAYae卡，您可以立即將貨幣兌換成加密貨幣，然後直接支付貨款或發送給朋友。
localize.tagline: 在全球40,000,000+商戶使用ZPAE卡支付。

previous.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
previous.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content

localize.description: 一个全面的工具，确保申请人跟踪系统(ATS)和其他自动过滤系统能够准确地阅读你的简历并从中提取文本。只有当机器能够正确阅读您的简历时，您的简历才会提交给人工审核员。
localize.tagline: 测试机器是否能解析你的简历并读取其内容。

localize.description: 一個全面的工具，確保申請人跟蹤系統(ATS)和其他自動過濾系統能夠準確地閱讀你的簡歷並從中提取文本。只有當機器能夠正確閱讀您的簡歷時，您的簡歷纔會提交給人工審覈員。
localize.tagline: 測試機器是否能解析你的簡歷並讀取其內容。

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 53 days in a row, down 69% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/64oEM5v8wM

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续53天下降，比1月6日的高峰期下降了69%。🙏https://t.co/64oEM5v8wM。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續53天下降，比1月6日的高峯期下降了69%。🙏https://t.co/64oEM5v8wM。
